name: Zone of the Enders 2: The Second Runner
name_original: Zone of the Enders 2: The Second Runner
description: Zone of the Enders: The 2nd Runner, known in Japan as Anubis: Zone of the Enders ,is a third-person shooter hack and slash video game that was developed and published by Konami for the PlayStation 2 in 2003. The sequel to Zone of the Enders is based around mecha combat with the player once again controlling the "Orbital Frame" Jehuty. Unlike its predecessor, the game is now centered on action elements with the player not needing to protect civilians in need and instead Jehuty contains more weaponry than in the previous game. (From Wikipedia)
